function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Biophilic design elements leading to excessive uncertainty and controversy","Impact":"Ineffective implementation of biophilic design","Mitigation":"Thorough research and evaluation of biophilic design elements","Technologies":"Research and analysis tools for biophilic design","People":"Architects and design professionals","Owner":"Biophilic design experts"},{"Description":"Overlap and repetition of biophilic design elements","Impact":"Confusion and inconsistency in the application of biophilic design","Mitigation":"Standardization of terminology and classification of elements","Technologies":"Database and classification software for biophilic design elements","People":"Architects and design professionals","Owner":"Biophilic design experts"},{"Description":"Insufficient investigation of architectural design issues such as form, typology, scale, proportion, and technology","Impact":"Limitations in the application of diverse biophilic designs in architecture","Mitigation":"In-depth study and analysis of architectural design principles","Technologies":"Architectural design software and simulation tools","People":"Architects and design professionals","Owner":"Architectural design researchers"}]}
